title: position
description:
A report message of the position (among other things) of the drone. Similar to the ADS-B concept but to be sent to the UTM. Not all drones will be able to provide all values.  
*** I inferred some basic values but I don't know exactly which kind of values can provide a small drone.

vx.description: X Speed (in Latitude direction, positive: going north) (float)

vy.description: Y Speed (in Latitude direction, positive: going north) (float)

vz.description: Z Speed (in Latitude direction, positive: going north) (float)
